page.title: 14LOCAL PRICES
page.content: FOOD PUB PRICES sugar 1kg 47p 1pt Bitter 74p packet tea 80b 140p Whisky 62p 1quarter lb tea 24p Martini 61p margarine lb 73p Sherry 57p thin loaf bread 42p Coke 36p large wholemeal 56p Fruit Juice 39p 1lb flour 54p Wine (glass) 66p 1lb butter 100p 1pt Cider 78p 1pt lager 79p HOUSING (pounds)Gin 62p Houses- semidetached 25 000 PUB FOOD smalldetached 18 000 Soup 50p detached 39 000 Pizza/Chips 140p Sausage/Chips 160p BUNGALOWS Gammon/Chips 245p semidetached 21 750 Haddock/Chips 170p detached 35 000 Beef Salad 180p Prawn Salad 220p Sweets Choice 70p
